text: Zdiby is a municipality and village in the Prague-East District, Central Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. It has a population of about 4,000. The first written notice about the village is from 1266. It is a member of Mikroregion Povodí Mratínského potoka. ==Parts of municipality== * Zdiby * Veltěž * Přemyšlení * Brnky ==References== ==External links== *Village website (cz) *Data about Zdiby at Czech Statistical Office web (in Czech) Category:Villages in Prague-East District
title: Zdiby
